choices.name: Decline_all_recommendations_and_create_a_withdrawal_case
choices.choiceText: Decline all recommendations and create a withdrawal case

value.stringValue: Decline all recommendations and create a withdrawal case

decisions.description: If this has been called from the confirm advice flow and the advice was non presented, we cannot yet confirm whether advice was accepted.
decisions.name: Acceptance_confirmation_needed
decisions.label: Acceptance confirmation needed?

decisions.description: If this is being called from the confirm advice flow, no recipients will have been created previously, so we start from scratch. If called from the mark decisions flow, we will have advice recipients, so we just need to update these existing ones
decisions.name: Have_advice_recipients_been_passed_in
decisions.label: Have advice recipients been passed in?

decisions.name: Have_we_recorded_this_client
decisions.label: Have we recorded this primary client?

decisions.name: Have_we_recorded_this_joint_client
decisions.label: Have we recorded this joint client?

decisions.name: Have_we_recorded_this_registered_owner
decisions.label: Have we recorded this registered owner?

Flow.description: Sub flow to call when advice recipient records need updating or creating
Flow.label: Advice Recipients | Create and update

fields.name: Was_this_client_in_the_meeting
fields.fieldText: Was this client present for ALL of the meeting?

fields.name: Has_the_client_accepted_any_of_our_recommendations
fields.helpText: If the client has accepted even one of our recommendations, please select 'Yes'. If they've declined every single one of them, please select 'No'. If they've not decided, please select 'Still considering'.

value.stringValue: If you click OK, all recommendations made to this client will be declined (primary or joint owner included).

fields.name: Was_this_client_in_the_meetingNonAdvised
fields.fieldText: Was this client present for ALL of the meeting?

variables.description: Passed in to the flow, indicates this sub flow has been called from the advice confirmation flow
variables.name: calledFromAdviceConfirmation

variables.description: Passed into the flow, indicates whether the advice recipient records should be updated with decisions now
variables.name: recipientConfirmationNeeded
